Title
Building Envelope Replacement at Lark Harbour Canadian Coast Guard Lifeboat Station { English } / Remplacement de l’enveloppe du bâtiment au poste de bateaux de sauvetage de la Garde côtière canadienne au Havre Lark { French }

Tender Notice Information
**Contractual Reference Number**: cb-71-65904294
**Date of Posting**: June 5, 2024	
**Tender Closing Date**: June 20, 2024 @ 2:00 p.m. (Eastern Time) 

Description
The Department of Fisheries and Oceans Canada, Canadian Coast Guard, is soliciting competitive bids to replace the building envelope components of the Lark Harbour Canadian Coast Guard Lifeboat Station. This includes complete replacement of exterior windows, exterior doors, air infiltration barriers, insulation, and roofing revitalization. 

Details can be found in the separate attachments: Specifications, Drawings and a Request for Qualification (RFQ).

**Location**
The Lark Harbour Canadian Coast Guard Lifeboat Station is situated on Main Street, Lark Harbour, NL. The facility is a Category 2 Search and Rescue (SAR) Station with a Directory of Federal Real Property (DFRP) Number: 80553.

**Selection Criteria**
The procurement will be conducted through a competitive bidding process with the lowest price being the determining factor. 

**Trade Agreements**
This procurement is subject to the Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA). 

**Tender Submission Requirements**
Interested bidders must submit their tenders electronically to: https://canadabuys.canada.ca/. Attachments are available for download from the specified link.

**Attachments**
A Request for Qualification (RFQ), specifications and drawings are attached to this announcement.

By Order of Fisheries and Oceans Canada / La Garde côtière canadienne
En vertu de Pêches et Océans Canada / La Garde côtière canadienne
